actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation, Forestry and Environment

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release on behalf of the United States a reversionary interest held by the United States in certain lands located in Payne County, Oklahoma, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest in specified lands in Payne County, Oklahoma, conveyed to the Board of Regents for Oklahoma State University. Conditions such release upon the Board of Regents compliance with a certain agreement to transfer the Federal reversionary interest to other lands specified in such agreement.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release on behalf of the United States a reversionary interest held by the United States in certain lands located in Payne County, Oklahoma, and for other purposes.
